title: Mother and son. No. 1 (Captioned)
creator_credit: Geoffrey Atherden, Geoffrey Portmann and ABC-TV (Australia)
brief_description: The money : Maggie has been saving up her pension cheques and Arthur needs to find them, but where are they? “The aunt” : Arthur invites Maggie’s sister Lorna for a visit. At first all goes well but then Lorna dares to pick some of Maggie’s flowers… “The accident” : Someone drops a typewriter on Arthur’s foot and he’s stuck at home being nursed by Maggie! Stars Ruth Cracknell and Garry McDonald with Henri Szeps and Judy Morris.
